title: Transmission 002: Echoes From The Simulation
lore: They told us reality was stable. But since the Singularity, patterns are... off. Street signs melt into code. Conversations loop. This is no longer physicsâ€”it's playback. And someone hit rewind.

prompts.title: Concept 1: Glitched Reflection
prompts.description: A mirror that reflects your digital self instead of your physical form.
prompts.prompt: A glowing mirror in a neon-lit void, reflecting a fractured, pixelated humanoid composed of code and static. Glitch aesthetics, surreal lighting, black and chrome tones.

prompts.title: Concept 2: Broken Sim HUD
prompts.description: A heads-up display overlays reality with corrupted interface data.
prompts.prompt: Futuristic HUD UI glitched and bleeding into reality. Floating error messages, distorted AR elements over a neon city skyline, black background with magenta and blue glitch overlays.
